DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator that asks whether the patient had prior therapy with angiogenesis inhibitors.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to angiogenesis inhibitor (an agent or endogenous substance that inhibits the formation and growth of blood or lymphatic vessels) therapy (an action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process) administered (given).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An agent or endogenous substance that inhibits the formation and growth of blood or lymphatic vessels.  In cancer therapy, angiogenesis inhibitors target blood vessels that supply tumors, thereby inhibiting tumor growth. (NCI04):An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: An agent or endogenous substance that inhibits the formation of capillaries from existing blood vessels. In cancer therapy, angiogenesis inhibitors preferentially target the new blood vessels that tumors require for oxygen and nutrition, thereby inhibiting the growth and spread of these tumors.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has the patient had prior the
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had prior therapy with angiogenesis inhibitors, for example bevacizumab and sorafenib

ReferenceDocuments.name: ACRIN 6690
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the participant received sorafenib treatment (or comparable antiangiogenic therapy) prior to enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received bevacizumab in the upfront or recurrent setting?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient previously used bevacizumab in the upfront or recurrent setting?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Use of bevacizumab or other antiangiogenic therapy to treat current mesothelioma (due to potential for increased complications from local therapy).
